Expression

Base class for all expression nodes.

Summary
Expression
Base class for all expression nodes.
Functions
getPHP
Returns the expression represented in PHP.
getJS
Returns the expression represented in JavaScript.
ChildExpr
A base expression class for expressions that can have child nodes.
Functions
getChildren
Returns the children of this expression node.

Functions

getPHP

abstract public function getPHP($indent)

Returns the expression represented in PHP.

Parameters

$indentThe current indentation string that should be concatenated after newlines.

Returns

A string representing the expression in PHP.

getJS

abstract public function getJS($indent)

Returns the expression represented in JavaScript.

Parameters

$indentThe current indentation string that should be concatenated after newlines.
$parserAn instance of <DescParser>.  In Javascript, some form elements are accessed in different ways, so the expression then needs to know its input type.  With a DescParser it can ask this information.

Returns

A string representing the expression in JavaScript.

ChildExpr

A base expression class for expressions that can have child nodes.

Functions
getChildren
Returns the children of this expression node.

Functions

getChildren

abstract public function getChildren()

Returns the children of this expression node.

Returns

An array of Expression nodes.
